mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where id=#{id} and item_seq=#{item_seq}
select row_number() over(order by i.seq desc) as rown, i.* from cart c, item i where c.item_seq = i.seq and id=#{id}
select count(*) from cart where id=#{value}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where item_seq=#{item_seq} and id=#{id}
